title: Uploading Spectate Videos Onto Youtube
body: Is it authorized to spectate pro-players(Through a replay website) and upload their games onto a personal youtube channel? I see many people do this and I would like to make montages of pro players but do not know if it goes against riot or youtube policy.

replies.body: I'm not sure we have any specific policy about this kind of thing, but I definitely wouldn't suggest doing this kind of thing. With pro players taking their matches and scrimmages pretty seriously, I could see a wide variety of issues coming up from doing that.
